title: How to apply as a Freelance Sales Agent?
content: At the moment, we are not onboarding freelance sales agents. However, we welcome referrals! If you refer someone who successfully becomes an installed customer, you’ll receive a referral reward of ₱300 for each confirmed installation. It’s a simple way to earn while helping others connect with our services.

title: How to change our WiFi Password?
content:
You can access it through the following instruction below:

1. Open your browser (Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Safari)
2. Type 192.168.100.1 in the URL box and wait for the Huawei UI web page to show up
3. Put root as the username and admin as the password.

4. You will see this modem UI after entering the password. Click WiFi Configuration.

5. Enter your desired password. Note: Do not hide the network.

title: How to change our WiFi Name?
content:
You can access it through the following instruction below:

1. Open your browser (Google Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, Safari)
2. Type 192.168.100.1 in the URL box and wait for the Huawei UI web page to show up
3. Use root as the username and admin as the password.

4. You will see this modem UI after entering the password. Click WiFi Configuration.

5. Enter the desired WiFi name. Note: Do not hide the network.

title: What are the requirements for internet application?
content:
Initial Information – To confirm your installation request, we will need your full name, complete address, and contact number. Once received, please allow 1–3 days for our team to conduct a site survey before proceeding with installation.

On-Site Process – When our team arrives in your area, you’ll be asked to fill out our installation form, which includes your personal details and a copy of our terms and conditions for your review and agreement.

Installation Fee – A one-time installation fee of ₱1,000–₱1,500 will be collected, depending on your location and distance from the main road.

Monthly Internet Fee – Your monthly internet subscription fee will begin one month after the installation date.
